title: manamE maravadE
sahitya:
manadE maravAdE guha dEvanaiyE kanavilum



anupallavi



inidAm nala matanODu tIngedu tAn varinumE



caraNam



sAmi pAdamE sadA nI manamE ninaindiDavE iSta kAmiyangaL yAvum tandiDumE
vanamEvukura min-
avaLOdu hEmavati minnAL maruvu kandanumE naya kavi kunjaradAsan namai ALum
santatamE
